meanings.definition: A quick closing and opening of the eye.
meanings.sent1: With a sly eyewink, she signaled to her friend across the room.
meanings.sent2: He missed the subtle eyewink that indicated the start of their secret code.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the actor's eyewink to the audience caused unexpected laughter.
meanings.sent4: The spy's eyewink conveyed more than words ever could in that moment of danger.
meanings.sent5: Her eyewink was like a silent agreement between them, understood without a word.

meanings.definition: A very short period of time.
meanings.sent1: In the eyewink of a moment, everything changed.
meanings.sent2: The meeting lasted only an eyewink before it was adjourned.
meanings.sent3: The magician claimed he could make a coin disappear in an eyewink.
meanings.sent4: The decision was made in the eyewink of a second, altering their fate.
meanings.sent5: Life can turn upside down in the eyewink of a heartbeat, so cherish every moment.
